title: Lloyd Kazapua
text:
Lloyd Junior Jaseuavi Kazapua (born 25 March 1989) is a <a href="Namibia">Namibia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays in South Africa for <a href="Baroka%20F.C.">Baroka</a>.
International.
He made his <a href="Namibia%20national%20football%20team">Namibia national football team</a> debut on 4 January 2014 in a friendly against Ghana.
He was selected for the <a href="2019%20Africa%20Cup%20of%20Nations">2019 Africa Cup of Nations</a> squad.
